CustomField.description: wd field True if the response status was opened. Indicates response was actionable.
CustomField.formula: AND( NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c,"Resolved - No Action Required"), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c,"Resolved - Already Engaged"), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c,"Not a Response"), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c,"Legacy"), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c,"")) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: True if the response status was opened. Indicates response was actionable.
CustomField.label: Actionable
